talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Aaq's mama is really good at painting!
Isn't this sand seal so cute?

It looks just like the <clr:0000>one I see when
it's bedtime<clr:ffff>!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>They let me store my sun balloon here!


I'm going to take good care of it forever
and ever.

Then, when I grow up, I'll fly it to go see
Mama and Papa!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Close! It's like this. ♪That's why
every-son chooses Hudson
Construct-sooon!♪
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Aaq! Let's play Hudson Construct-son!


Do you remember the song? Ahem-hem...


<snd:Humming>♪Quick and quality, blink and
we're done...♪
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Aaq! Let's play Hudson Construct-son!
What sort of work should we do today?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Sav'a! <sp:5:0:0>The trend is to keep
introduct-sons short.

Mama taught me "sav'saaba," but that's
how old people say it.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Close! They build dream homes, not just
dream rooms.

We bring your one-of-a-kind dream homes
to life!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Aaq is going to show me her treasure!
It's in a secret locat-son.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>This balloon is under my protect-son.
I come here every day to take care of it!

When I grow up, I'm going to take it to
see Mama and Papa.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Aaq! Let's play Hudson Construct-son!


All right. Time for roll call!
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Votta! <sp:5:0:0>The trend is to keep
introduct-sons short.

Mama taught me "sav'otta," but that's
how old people say it.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Sorry. I can't play with you now—it's time
for Kids Klub.
Talk_2001: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Whoa! <sp:5:1:0>I'm not allowed to talk to weirdos!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Sav'a! <sp:5:0:0>The trend is to keep
introduct-sons short.

Mama taught me "sav'aaq," but that's
how old people say it.
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>OK! Aaqlet, reporting for duty! Choose us,
and it's son and done!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Aaq and I are going to see the
sun balloon!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Close! It's "Aaqson," not "Aaqlet."
That's an important addit-son!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>I'm racing Aaq to the sun balloon!
I've gotta pay attent-son!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>The sand seal Aaq's mama painted is
just the cutest!

It looks just like the <clr:0000>one I see when
it's bedtime<clr:ffff>.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Huh?!<sp:5:0:0> You're the guy who gave me
those sundelions!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Sarq for that!


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>The sun balloon Papa made me is really
popular, so I made friends with everyone
in town right away.
It's just like Mama and Papa said.
They're still watching over me, even
though we're far apart.
I just remember that when I'm feeling sad.
I'm really glad I came!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>If you want to be in my room you need
my permiss-son.
talk0019:
<snd:Humming>♪That's why Hudson Construction is
chosen by everysooon!♪
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>Mama... <sp:5:0:0>Papa...<sp:5:0:0> I forgot to ment-son...<sp:5:0:0>
I made a great friend...
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>This is my room, so you can't have it.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll have to wait until I move away—<sp:5:0:0>
end of discuss-son!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup_00>So...<sp:5:1:0>sleepy.<sp:5:1:0> You should go to bed...
You have my <sp:5:1:0>*yawn*<sp:5:1:0> permiss-son...
